org.jvoicexml.jndi.client
Interface RemoteJVoiceXml

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
public interface RemoteJVoiceXml
extends Remote

Remote interface to enable remote method calls betwenn JVoiceXmlSkeleton and JVoiceXmlStub.

Since:
0.4

Method Detail

getVersion

String getVersion()
                  throws RemoteException
Retrieves the version information of JVoiceXml.

Returns:
Version number.
Throws:
RemoteException - Error in remote method call.
Since:
0.4.1

createSession

Session createSession(RemoteClient client)
                      throws RemoteException
Creates a new session.

The Session is the entry point to start the interpreter. A session is obtained by a remote client.

Parameters:
client - The remote client that called the interpreter, maybe null. If it is null the default implementation platform is used.
Returns:
The new session.
Throws:
RemoteException - Error creating the session.
See Also:
ImplementationPlatform

shutdown

void shutdown()
              throws RemoteException
Shutdown the interpreter and free all resources.

Throws:
RemoteException - Error in remote method call.
